title: DJ Mixer Pro V3.5.0 [deepstatus]
description:
DJ Mixer Pro V3.5.0




         Professional Video, karaoke & Audio Mixing Software


DJ Mixer Pro is leading-edge DJ/VJ software for both beginner DJs and seasoned pros alike, It combines a sophisticated, easy-to-use interface with innovative mixing tools to help you perform electrifying live mixes!

Take advantage of all four decks to create unique, complex, and dynamic mixes. Whether you mix Audio only, or require the added visual dynamics of Video & Karaoke mixing, DJ Mixer ProÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s innovative feature set, reliable mixing engine and intuitive interface will insure that you " Rock the House " every night. Automated beat matching, realtime effects, sampler, smart looping, tempo shifting, pitch shifting, MIDI controller support, video mixing, plus many more great features are all at your finger tips.


This Professional DJ mixing software enables you to mix your music, karaoke and video in various formats such as MP3, M4A, WAV, AIFF, FLAC, OGG, CDA, Karaoke CDG, MP3+G, AVI, MPEG, MP4, MOV, MKV, FLV, WMV and more. in real time. All you need is a sound card.

Perfect for Club DJs, Mobile DJs,Video DJs, discos, pubs, hair studios, clubs, parties, restaurants and at home.



                DJ Software Features

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ One-click beat matching and synchronisation.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 2 or 4 decks with professional grade mixer and playlists.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Video mix (mix songs and/or video clips !)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Fully compatible with iTunes playlists.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatic mixing or manual mixing of songs.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatic BPM calculation with batch-mode function
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatic key detection (perfect for harmonic mixing)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Midi-Learn for simple mapping of DJ midi-controllers and/or your keyboard
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Instant loops and hot loop points, AutoCue
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports third-party VST effects, AudioUnits, eqs, filters.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Seamless live looping and "skipbeat "
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatic Gain Control (AGC)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Analog input for microphone/turntables/CD-players, Talk-Over.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ External DJ controllers supported natively (zero-configure)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Advanced support for external mixers
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Pitch scaling for harmonic/key mixing
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Vinyl simulation including scratch, pitch, reverse play
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sample player Ã¢â‚¬â€œ load up audio clips and trigger them
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Waveform markers for cue points, loop, mix in/out
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ASIO/CoreAudio low-latency support.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ High-quality time-stretching.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Record your mixes to MP3, WAV or AIFF.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ MIDI controller support
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Connect up to 8 MIDI / HID devices at the same time
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ MIDI/HID scripting for advanced control & complex actions
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ You can apply 8 distinct effects and also a sweep filter.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Timecoded vinyls/CD support.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ KeyLock (master-tempo), gradual pitch bend
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Preview songs in headphones before loading to deck
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Skin support Ã¢â‚¬â€œ change the user Interface.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ CPU meter
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Automatically load CD
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scan/import files and folders in the background
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Audio/Video/Karaoke filters
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Color markers to the list tracks
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Supports mp3, wav, ogg, m4a, mp4, mpeg, avi, aiff, flac, cda, flv, mov, mkv, wmv, Karaoke CDG files and etc.





            The new version 3.5 is ready for you:


   The leading-edge DJ Mixing software, Now fully compatible with Windows 8.
   FLV videos support
   brand new flexible audio routing
   video engine greatly improved
   15 new controllers supported:
       American Audio VersaDeck
       American Audio VMS2
       Beyond Abma1
       Beyond Music MIDI_8 CE
       Denon HC1000
       Denon MC3000
       Denon MC6000
       Faderfox DJ3
       Hercules DJ Control Steel ( reimplemented from scratch )
       Reloop Contour CE
       Reloop Mixage IE
       Stanton SCS.4DJ
       Vestax VCI100 MK2
       Vextax Typhoon
       Zomo MC1000
   preferences system completely revamped both visually and internally
       settings are applied instantly
       you can keep the preferences window open and still control the software
       all your old settings are lost
   global lists and database search
   change font dynamically (in real-time) in playlist/browser ( press on the list to have focus and then press +/-/0 on your keyboard )
   disabled Auto-Cueing by default
   now scanning tags for m4a, flac, wma too
   user writable controllers and skins folder ( user's Documents/DJMixerPro/controllers )
   lots of performance tweaks, fixes and improvements




            System Requirements:


Windows, fully compatible with Windows 8
